name: Li'l Icarus
description:
Historically accurate bird catchin' game.

Li'l Icarus is desperately trying to fix his wings on the fly before he plummets to his death.

Pummel some birds and collect enough feathers before you hit the sea.

Controls:
Keyboard - W, A, S, D or ARROW KEYS to move
Game pad - LEFT STICK to move

Nekomatata Games
Website: http://www.nekomatata.com
Twitter: @heynekomatata
